item.title: Taming thoughts & emotions
item.description: In my understanding the only way to tame them is a twofold one : accept & invite whatever arises listen to them and let them disappear ! if I chase or flee they might get stuck in my psyche and in my body ! Circulation only goes smooth whenever I welcome & feel through anything coming up from my deep deep soul or void, without becoming this newcomer, meaning If I resist or identify with it, my flow might get stuck
